title: Multi-intersizable HUD
body:
I've had this thought for a very long time, ever since season 2.
Multi-intersizable HUD!
What that means is you're able to adjust the size of each separate part in the HUD. (like in mmos and games like that)
I've always wanted to see in full sized view the top-side HUD section, so I can keep an easy eye on my teams HP and who I select, to see what their HP is, etc.
Yet I've always had it to its minimum because I do not want to have the bottom section of the HUD to take up most of my vision.
I'm sure this is something Riot could do, and it would help a lot being able to read more information given while also having vision with the bottom section of the screen.

If anyone else agrees or disagrees, comment below with your opinions!
Will update with more soon

==moved this thread from another board to here==

Thanks!
Rum
{{item:3174}}

replies.body: I wouldn't use it, but it still would be a nice feature to implement. I can see how someone could use it to keep important info where they can see it.
